bibl.title: Epistolary Conventions and Social Change in Paul's Letters.

Ancient History in a Modern University. Proceedings of a Conference Held at Macquarie University, 8-13 July 1993 to mark twenty-five years of the teaching of Ancient History at Macquarie University and the retirement from the Chair of Professor Edwin Judge. II. Early Christianity, Late Antiquity and Beyond
bibl.author: HARTMAN, Dale

bibl.note: Comparaison avec les requêtes et les pétitions sur papyrus. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 77 (2008) No. 6004.
HARTMAN Dale, Epistolary Conventions and Social Change in Paul's Letters.
